24:45 [Bruce] There have been a number of medical explanations that have been proposed to explain what causes near-death experiences. ‎これまで臨死体験について ‎多くの医学的仮説が出た
24:52 I'm all in favor of that. Being a doctor, I wanna understand what causes these things. 医学博士 ブルース･グレイソン 私も医師として 原因を知りたい
24:56 Unfortunately, I don't think any of the explanations we've come up with so far ‎残念ながら ‎これまでの仮説では‎―
25:00 help us very much in trying to understand things. ‎臨死体験を説明できない
25:05 Some have said drugs given to people as they're approaching death may cause near death experiences. ‎例えば“蘇生に使う薬剤が ‎臨死体験を誘発する”
25:11 And what we find is that the fewer drugs people are given... ‎実際は投与した薬剤が ‎少ない人ほど
25:15 the more likely they are to report a near death experience. ‎臨死体験をする確率が高い
25:18 That the drugs tend to inhibit the near-death experience, rather than causing it. ‎薬剤は臨死体験を阻害する
25:25 People also suggest lack of oxygen to the brain. ‎脳の酸欠を指摘する人もいる
